about_the_game:
Introduction

SCP: JOSIE is an exploration narrative game that invites players to delve into the extraordinary world of the SCP universe. In this unique experience, you assume the role of Josie, an anomalous cat designated as SCP-529. You will explore the mysteries surrounding this feline protagonist, whose body exhibits an unusual... absence.

Setting and Narrative

Set in the expansive and collaboratively created SCP universe, SCP: JOSIE is a narrative-driven exploration game where you step into the paws of Josie, a uniquely anomalous cat with a penchant for adventure. Set within the SCP: 5K universe, amidst the eerie aftermath of the Foundation's ominous Omnicide, uncover the secrets of Foundation Site-17 and venture beyond, into a world where humanity's footprint has faded, leaving room for the remnants of the natural and anomalous to reclaim their place.

Gameplay and Features

Explore a Mysterious World: Journey with Josie through the expansive and enigmatic SCP universe. From the depths of Foundation Site-17, submerged in secrets and anomalies, to the untouched wilds reclaiming the post-Omnicide world, each setting is rich with puzzles, lore, and hidden paths waiting to be uncovered.

Platforming and Puzzle Solving: Navigate through environmental puzzles and obstacles using Josie’s feline agility and instincts. Test your wit and dexterity as you traverse now defunct remnants of Foundation infrastructure, using the environment to your advantage and finding unconventional paths forward.

Dynamic Soundscapes and Visuals: Immerse yourself in an experience that blends pixel-art aesthetics with modern visual effects, complemented by a soundtrack that mirrors the mood and tone of your surroundings and actions.

Current Development

Please note that SCP: JOSIE is currently in development, creating a captivating and immersive experience for players in the future. We are currently targeting sometime in 2024!
